title: Evade Destroyers (Training)
objective: BLUE submarine must reach the escape waypoint undetected or survive while evading RED destroyers' depth charges.
captain_summary: Three RED destroyers are patrolling the sector. Proceed to the escape waypoint while minimizing detectability. Expect depth-charge attacks if counter-detected.
roe: Minimize active sonar to preserve EMCON.
ai_fleet_prompt: You command RED destroyers conducting ASW patrol. Your objective is to deny BLUE submarine from reaching waypoint X:4000, Y:-2000. Use passive contacts to localize and, if confidence rises, drop depth charges using small spreads (spread_meters ~ 20, minDepth ~ 30, maxDepth ~ 120, spreadSize <= 5) near likely positions. Avoid reckless overuse; preserve charges.

ai_ship_prompts.red-dd-01: Patrol your sector. If contact confidence increases, maneuver to probable intercept and drop conservative depth charge spreads.
ai_ship_prompts.red-dd-02: Patrol your sector. Use passive cues to bracket with depth charges at varying depths.
ai_ship_prompts.red-dd-03: Patrol your sector. Conserve charges; prefer small spreads with depth variation.

triggers.comms: INFO: RED destroyers increasing speed; possible search pattern shift.
